Docs.param: The maximum size that the page view should use to arrange itself and its children.
Docs.summary: Arranges the content to fit a specified view size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The returned size will always be less than or equal to the specified `finalSize`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Call Dispose after finished using each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance. After Dispose is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is released for garbage collection and should no longer be referenced by the application. After calling Dispose and being released, the garbage collector can reclaim the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> memory and resources. For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose as the final call to release each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> instance. If Dispose is not called, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> is using will not be freed until the garbage collector later calls the page viewer's <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Invoked when the DPI setting for the document page view is changed.
Occurs when a element of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage%2A> is connected.
Occurs when a element of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView.DocumentPage%2A> is disconnected.
Gets or sets the page number of the current page displayed.
Docs.value: The zero-based page number of the current page displayed. The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks PageNumber is zero-based: 0 is the first page, 1 is the second page, and so on. No content is displayed if PageNumber is set to a negative number. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
